info.+content: The nation of Qin fights for it's life when they are attacked by a large alliance of nations led by Li Mu. Contesting factions in Qin are forced to unite or perish. The Fei Shin Force gains an excellent strategist in Diao, who can no longer hide the fact she is a woman from Shin and the rest. However, they are absent their 2nd in command who has finally tracked down the target of her vengeance. Shin and his soldiers are in for the hardest battles of their lives and things look bleak, but on the battlefield also comes chances for glory..
TVアニメ「キングダム」公式サイト
